name: Star Crossing
description:
A cute singleplayer game about drawing constellations visible in the night sky (in Pittsburgh in the spring). Designed to help players gain some ability to pick out constellations in the night sky.

Controls:

F: Select starting constellation, select a star to draw a line

WASD: Move cursor

QE: Switch between focused constellation.

C: Enter full sky view, start game after constellation selection

Z: Enter hint view (preview completed constellations)
